name: bubble-beam
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.platinum: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Speed stat.
